messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] Parent's Stepping In
messages.msgSnippet: ... Jeffrey Dahmer started with animals.  He tortured them, killed them and messed with the bodies.  These boys have serious mental and emotional problems.
messages.messageBody:
>-- These same kids have been in trouble for cruelty
>to animals....(snip) No one wants to stir things up.
>Deb L

Jeffrey Dahmer started with animals. He tortured
them, killed them and messed with the bodies. These
boys have serious mental and emotional problems.
Either it's genetics, or they have a secret abuse
somewhere that no one knows about (maybe not even the
parents.) It's possible that someone hurt the oldest
boy (like sexual abuse or something) and he in turn
passed the favor on to his younger siblings. Are
their parents asleep at the wheel or what? These kids
need some intervention. Do them a favor and stir
things up before it's too late. They have already
moved on to abusing people.

Nanci K.
